humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report provides the size of the largest invasive carcinoma as 2.5 cm. According to the rules provided, T1 tumors are 2 cm or less, T2 tumors are more than 2 cm but not more than 5 cm, and T3 tumors are more than 5 cm. Therefore, the tumor size of 2.5 cm falls into the T2 category.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The T stage for staging cancer is based on the size of the tumor. In this report, the largest focus of invasion is over 0.1 cm and measures 2.5 cm (Tumor Size section of the report). Therefore, the T stage for this patient is T2, which refers to a tumor size >20 mm but less than or equal to 50 mm in greatest dimension.
